author: Jonathan Garber
description: Bitcoin is up 105% so far in 2017.
title: Bitcoin surges past $1,900 for the first time

author: Evelyn Cheng
description: The digital currency bitcoin jumped to a fresh all-time high Thursday as global investors looked for safe haven trades.
title: Bitcoin jumps to fresh record near $1,900 amid increased political risk

author: Arjun Kharpal
description: Factors including increased trading in Japan to debates over the future the bitcoin's underlying technology have boosted the price.
title: Bitcoin hits $1,900 to reach record high with market cap up $3.7 billion this week alone
